item.description:
The Catholic League says we shoudn't see this movie. That's enough reason for us.

The Showcase Cinema is located near 3, 495 and the Lowell Connector posts the showtimes. The 7:55 looks to work for the largest number of people... but please try to meet by 7:30 or so to be sure of getting tickets and in order to meet everyone from the group.

Scott Romanowski will be the on-site atheist organizer; spot him in his grey "Friendly neighborhood atheist" sweatshirt. He'll be meeting folks, answering his phone in case you get lost -- 978-987-6071 -- and, afterwards, coordinating plans for going out for a bite to eat, drink, or cup of coffee.

I've sent word to The Lowell Sun in case they want to see a group of good-natured, movie-going, family-loving atheists attending a film that has got a small portion of American Catholics all a-bother. So, smile widely and show your atheist pride.
item.name: The Golden Compass
